summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 14, Lake Union Addition, being the alley from North 42nd Street to North 43rd Street, between Woodlawn Avenue and Densmore Avenue; by paving and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Resolution No. 9877 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
